name: Le Poisson Naimeau (jam version WGJ40)
description:
Hi everyone,

Here's is my participation to the Weekly Game Jam 40 http://www.weeklygamejam.com/

As usual, i made everything, except the few music's notes. I take and modify them from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q4guVsEb_9I

CONTROLS : 

You play with your mouse, just click on the action's Icon to select them, and click again on the fish bowl to act.

Keep your fish alive by feeding him, add water, cleaning, and play him some music.

There's no really end here, just a game over page if you let the fish die.

Enjoy ^^
